name: 翁頌舜
objective:
指導學生進行資訊與財金專題研究，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成資訊與財金相關專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。

Teaching students to do the research project on Information and Financial Management and to write the project reports. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be finished to complete the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.
schedule:
1. 每周 meeting 討論。
2. 第 1-6 週專題發想。
3. 第 7-18 週專題規劃與製作。
scorePolicy: 期末總評比，包括專題分工、實驗進行與報告撰寫。
materials: 無特定教材，每周討論並適時提供專題製作所需資訊。
